QuestData.Title: Come Together
QuestData.Description: Your work is done here, $n. I will stay here for now and help clean up any remaining demons.$B$BYou should return to your outpost and let Dranarus know of our success. He can relay that information to Azeroth.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Knight-Lord Dranarus at Vol'jin's Pride.
QuestData.RewardText: Lady Liadrin was indeed wise in choosing you. I will let Vol'jin know of your victory immediately.
